Class BusinessObjectWithSelect

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--matrix.db.ErrorObject
        |
        +--matrix.db.BusinessObject
              |
              +--matrix.db.BusinessObjectWithSelect
All Implemented Interfaces:
ImageProvider, java.io.Serializable
public class BusinessObjectWithSelect
extends BusinessObject

The BusinessObjectWithSelect class provides functionality for selects on queries and sets.

See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Summary
BusinessObjectWithSelect(BusinessObjectWithSelect object)
          Create a new BusinessObjectWithSelect object
 
Method Summary
 java.util.Hashtable getHashtable()
          Deprecated. as of ADK 10.0: The keys for a Hashtable must each be unique within that Hashtable. The keys returned by certain complex select clauses from eMatrix are not guaranteed to be unique. Therefore the packing of a list of fully-realized select clauses and their corresponding values may result in a LOSS of data. If any of the keys is repeated, the last value loaded into the Hashtable wins. Replace with getSelectKeys(), getSelectValues(), getSelectTypes() to get independent synchronized vectors of keys, values, and datatypes

getHashtable

public java.util.Hashtable getHashtable()
Deprecated. as of ADK 10.0: The keys for a Hashtable must each be unique within that Hashtable. The keys returned by certain complex select clauses from eMatrix are not guaranteed to be unique. Therefore the packing of a list of fully-realized select clauses and their corresponding values may result in a LOSS of data. If any of the keys is repeated, the last value loaded into the Hashtable wins. Replace with getSelectKeys(), getSelectValues(), getSelectTypes() to get independent synchronized vectors of keys, values, and datatypes

Get the HashTable.
Returns:
HashTable for the object.
Since:
ADK 9.0.0
